front.title: IM4-099 (Eyeemmfour)
front.gametext: Whenever opponent Force drains at same or adjacent site, may deploy up to four troopers there as a 'react.' When IM4 is present with your trooper, Rebels are deploy +2 to same site and opponent may not 'react' to or from same site.
front.lore: Imperial Mark IV Patrol Droid. Identifies criminal activity and transmits information to local authorities. Monitors random comm signals for illegal activity.
